Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
This class holds an inventory of food items Student Name: Samuel Omaghomi Student Number: 041012180 Course: CST8130 - Data Structures CET-CS-Level 3 Due Date: 20/02/2022 Professor: James Mwangi
